1370: Sarre was born in St. Joris straet in 1370.
Got married to Kornillis at age 24 in 1370.
Gave birth to Margareta in 1370 at age 24.
1371: Gave birth to Alvericus in 1371 at age 25.
1373: Gave birth to Nannen in 1373 at age 27.
Lost daughter Nannen when Nannen was 1 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Clara in 1378 at age 32.
1379: Gave birth to Assceric in 1379 at age 33.
1380: Gave birth to Yda in 1380 at age 34.
1381: Gave birth to Truden in 1381 at age 35.
1383: Gave birth to Gisekin in 1383 at age 37.
